name: gitHex.performRebase
description: Execute rebase with automatic abort on conflict. REQUIRES: clean working tree (no uncommitted changes). Rebases all commits in onto..HEAD range with autosquash support.

repoPath.description: Path to the git repository (defaults to single configured root)

autosquash.description: Automatically squash fixup! and squash! commits (default: true)

headBefore.description: HEAD commit hash before the operation

headAfter.description: HEAD commit hash after the operation

summary.description: Human-readable explanation of what was done

commitsRebased.description: Number of commits that were rebased
